Uses of Package
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util

  • Packages that use org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util 
    Package Description
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly
    The assembly package contains objects for working with genomic data that has been assembled into Contigs and Scaffolds.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.ace
    This package contains classes for handling Contigs stored in the Ace File Format.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util
    The Assembly util package contains utility classes that are useful for working with general assembly data regardless of what assembler was used or file format the data is in.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util.consensus
    The Consensus package will compute Consensus for a given Slice.
    org.jcvi.jillion.internal.assembly.util  
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util used by org.jcvi.jillion.assembly 
    Class and Description
    CoverageMap
    A CoverageMap is an Object that contains coverage information for a contiguous range of offset values.
    GapQualityValueStrategy
    GapQualityValueStrategies are different strategy implementations on how to assign quality values to gaps in a sequence.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util used by org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.ace 
    Class and Description
    GapQualityValueStrategy
    GapQualityValueStrategies are different strategy implementations on how to assign quality values to gaps in a sequence.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util used by org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util 
    Class and Description
    ContigCoverageMapBuilder
    ContigCoverageMapBuilder will build a CoverageMap where each CoverageRegion will contain AssembledReads.
    CoverageMap
    A CoverageMap is an Object that contains coverage information for a contiguous range of offset values.
    CoverageMapBuilder
    CoverageMapBuilder will build a CoverageMap of the given elements.
    CoverageMapStats
    CoverageMapStats is a class that contains commonly used statistics such as min, max, and average coverage values for a single CoverageMap.
    CoverageRegion
    A CoverageRegion is a contiguous portion of a CoverageMap which has exactly the same elements (and therefore the same depth of coverage).
    CoverageStatsCombiner 
    GapQualityValueStrategy
    GapQualityValueStrategies are different strategy implementations on how to assign quality values to gaps in a sequence.
    Slice
    A Slice is a one base wide vertical cut of an assembly containing zero or more SliceElements.
    SliceBuilder
    SliceBuilder is a Builder object that builds a single Slice instance which contains given SliceElements.
    SliceBuilder.SliceElementFilter
    SliceElementFilter is used to remove SliceElements currently in the Slice being built.
    SliceElement
    SliceElement is a single position of a read contained in a Slice.
    SliceMap
    A SliceMap is a contiguous group of Slices of a contig.
    SliceMapBuilder 
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util used by org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util.consensus 
    Class and Description
    GapQualityValueStrategy
    GapQualityValueStrategies are different strategy implementations on how to assign quality values to gaps in a sequence.
    Slice
    A Slice is a one base wide vertical cut of an assembly containing zero or more SliceElements.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util used by org.jcvi.jillion.internal.assembly.util 
    Class and Description
    GapQualityValueStrategy
    GapQualityValueStrategies are different strategy implementations on how to assign quality values to gaps in a sequence.
    Slice
    A Slice is a one base wide vertical cut of an assembly containing zero or more SliceElements.
    SliceElement
    SliceElement is a single position of a read contained in a Slice.
    SliceMap
    A SliceMap is a contiguous group of Slices of a contig.
